K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:328b-1: p'u dza me gha n'a ma dh'a ra ni; bod skad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:328b-2: mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:328b-3: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:328b-4: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:328b-5: na mo bha ga wa te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:328b-6: badzra s'a ra pra marda ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:328b-7: ta th'a ga t'a ya; aarha te samyaksam buddha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:328b-13: ma h'a bo dhi tsitta badzre /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:328b-14: ma h'a bo dhi mando pa sam kra ma na badzre /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329a-0: sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi @329a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329a-4: dran pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur zhing zhabs la phyag byas bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329a-19: bshos gtsang la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329a-21: lhab lhub thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329a-22: sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329a-23: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329a-24: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329a-32: lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329a-33: lag na rdo rje la sogs pa gsang ba ba'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329a-34: rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams phyi bzhin yang dag par 'brang zhing srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329a-37: 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329b-0: yon tan gyi @329b khyad par 'di dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329b-1: ma bsgrubs par lan gcig dran pa tsam gyis thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-058:329b-2: mchod pa'i sbrin ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
